title: India Microgrid (CHP, Natural Gas, Solar PV, Diesel, Fuel Cell, Remote, Grid Connected, Hybrid) Market Size, Share & Trends Analysis Report 2024-2030
summary: The Indian microgrid market is projected to reach USD 8.01 billion by 2030, driven by increasing demand for reliable power, government initiatives promoting renewable energy, and technological advancements. Key factors include the increasing demand for reliable power in rural areas, government policies supporting clean energy, and technological advancements in smart grid technologies. The market is segmented by power source, connection type, and end-use, with the CHP segment dominating the market.
